text:
University of Illinois
April 27, 1939
Page #2
If you will be attending the Radio Parts Show in
Chicago in June the writer will be at the Stevens
Hotel, and we will also have an exhibit in space
#10, (first on left when entering), I will be
glad to have you join me at lunch any day you are
at the show where we can sit down and discuss all
angles of recording.
Again thanking you for consideration shown our equipÂ¬
ment, we are, with kindest regards
Very truly yours
JRF:mm
Dictated By Mr. Fouch
But Signed In His absenca
